setProjectValues

public static void setProjectValues(java.lang.String projectName,
                                    java.lang.String projectClassPath)
Jde should call this everytime the project changes, or if the classpath needs to be updated.

Parameters:
projectName - a String value
projectClassPath - a String value

classExists

public static void classExists(java.lang.String fqn)
Determine whether a class exists on the JDEE classpath.

Parameters:
fqn - Fully qualified name of the class to be found.

updateClassList

public static void updateClassList(java.lang.String classPathEntry)
Reload classes contained by a class, jar, or zip file or the current project's classpath.

Parameters:
classPathEntry - path to be reloaded. If null, this method reloads the current project's classpath.

updateClassList

public static void updateClassList()
Reload the current project's classpath.

getQualifiedName

public static void getQualifiedName(java.lang.String className)
Looks up an unqualified class name in the class path to find possible fully qualified matches. Given `List,' this will find `java.util.List' and `java.awt.List'

Parameters:
className - a value of type 'String'
